panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: hosted-runners-logging Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_1h{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_5m{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_1h{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_30m{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_shard_errors:ratio_6h{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"} > on(tier, type, __tenant_id__) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="usage_logs",type="hosted-runners-logging"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: hosted-runners-logging Service RPS - Requests per Second
Fluentd output status flush time rate
